goal.ch: 本課程主要傳授預力混凝土(prestressed concrete, 簡稱PC)結構設計基本理論，以及介紹目前常用預力混凝土預鑄結構。在PC設計理論方面，主要重點為PC工法說明，撓曲與剪力分析與設計，預力鋼鍵配置，以及估算預力損失等。
goal.en: This course mainly teaches the basic theory of prestressed concrete (PC) structural design and introduces the currently commonly used prestressed concrete structures. Regarding PC design theory, the main focus is on PC tendon stressing methods, design of bending and shear, prestressing tendon configuration, and estimation of prestress losses.

outline.ch:
1. 預力混凝土系統簡介
2. 材料性質
3  彎曲分析與設計
4. 鋼鍵配置
5. 預力損失
6. 剪力設計
7. 鋼鍵錨錠區設計
outline.en:
1. Introduction of prestressed concrete systems
2. Material Properties
3. Flexural Analysis and Design
4.Tendon Layout
5. Prestressed Losses
6. Shear Design
7. Design of Tendon Anchorage Zone

textbook.ch:
英文教科書
M.P. Collins , and D. Mitchell, Prestressed Concrete Structures, Prentice Hall, 1991.
textbook.en: M.P. Collins , and D. Mitchell, Prestressed Concrete Structures, Prentice Hall, 1991.

gradMethod.en:
Quiz(2 times): 30％
mid term exam.: 35％
final term exam.: 35％

flexDiscription.ch: 第17與第18週為自主學習或補救教學。
flexDiscription.en: The 17th and 18th weeks are flexible teaching as supplementary weeks when the teaching contents cannot be achieved.

ch.competencies: 運用數學、科學及工程知識之能力
設計、執行實驗及分析之能力
土木工程設計及監造之能力
計畫管理、人際溝通，專業表達與撰寫之能力
團隊合作與整合之能力
主動發掘、分析及解決問題之能力
國際觀、吸收新知以及自我學習之能力
工程技術與生態環境之互動
工程倫理並善盡社會責任，並具有人文素養及服務人群之精神

en.competencies: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing  Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical  Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限四年級。指定課程:必須擋修CI3005。
en: Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Course blockingCI3005 only.
